General.Name: GuangZhou BaiYun Elec Equip Co
General.Description: Guangzhou Baiyun Electric Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacturing, and sale of capacitors, transformers, switchgear, frequency converters, automatic control, intelligent components, and other products in China and internationally. Its products include high voltage GIS, medium voltage C-GIS, medium voltage metal enclosed switchgear, ring main unit, DC traction switchgear, low voltage switchgear, distribution box, intelligent bus, medium voltage switch, low voltage switch, and intelligent components. The company also offers integrated energy service systems, smart substation solution, smart distribution grids, rail transit power supply system equipment, data center solutions, intelligent water solutions, power quality management solutions, and tram power supply solutions. Guangzhou Baiyun Electric Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 18 Daling South Road, Guangzhou, China, 510460
